title: Late Night White House Press Briefing | Simon Rich
description:
Seth "asks" Sarah Huckabee Sanders some tough questions in the Late Night White House Press Briefing.

Then, Seth interviews his friend, comedy writer Simon Rich, who also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.
